title: Buddy the Otter
synopsis: A simple comic where small events lead to trouble and humor.
visual_style: Classic mid-20th-century comic style, flat and faded colors, strong black outlines, simple backgrounds, minimal detail, traditional hand-drawn look, and panels are clean and easy to read.

locations.name: Town Square
locations.description: A plain town square with boxy buildings and large windows.

characters.name: Buddy
characters.description: An otter with simple design and clear expressions, wearing a blue t-shirt and jeans. Straightforward and honest.

rules: You can not access the moon or outer space.
Magic does not exist in this world.
long_term_goals: Navigate small-town trouble with honesty and good humor
